languages.text: "Не то чтобы я пытался торговаться с вами, но обещаю — если согласитесь помочь, увидите, насколько действительно внушительным Глейто может быть в деле".
"Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."
languages.original_text: "Не то чтобы я пытался торговаться с вами, но обещаю — если согласитесь помочь, увидите, насколько действительно внушительным Глейто может быть в деле".

traits.locale_text: "Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."
"Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."
"Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."
"Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."
"Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."

languages.text: «No confunda esto con un intento torpe de negociación, pero le prometo que, si accede a ayudarnos, podrá ver lo impresionante que es Glaito en acción».
languages.original_text: "Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."

traits.locale_text: «No confunda esto con un intento torpe de negociación, pero le prometo que, si accede a ayudarnos, podrá ver lo impresionante que es Glaito en acción».

languages.text: “我接下来要说的话并不是在讨价还价，不过我可以向你保证，如果你愿意帮助我们的话，你可以亲眼看到格雷托在战场上的英姿。”
languages.original_text: "Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."

traits.locale_text: “我接下来要说的话并不是在讨价还价，不过我可以向你保证，如果你愿意帮助我们的话，你可以亲眼看到格雷托在战场上的英姿。”

languages.text: « N'y voyez aucune tentative de marchandage de ma part, mais je vous garantis que si vous acceptez de nous aider, vous serez le témoin privilégié de l'efficacité redoutable de Glaito sur le terrain. »
languages.original_text: "Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."

traits.locale_text: « N'y voyez aucune tentative de marchandage de ma part, mais je vous garantis que si vous acceptez de nous aider, vous serez le témoin privilégié de l'efficacité redoutable de Glaito sur le terrain. »

languages.text: 「これは取引の試みだと誤解しないでください。ただし、私たちを助けてくださるのであれば、グライトの真の能力を実際に見ることができると約束します」
languages.original_text: "Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."

traits.locale_text: 「これは取引の試みだと誤解しないでください。ただし、私たちを助けてくださるのであれば、グライトの真の能力を実際に見ることができると約束します」

languages.text: "Bu dediğimi pazarlık olarak algılamayın ancak size sözümdür... Bize yardım etmeyi kabul ederseniz Glaito'nun ne kadar etkileyici olduğunu kendi gözlerinizle göreceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."

traits.locale_text: "Bu dediğimi pazarlık olarak algılamayın ancak size sözümdür... Bize yardım etmeyi kabul ederseniz Glaito'nun ne kadar etkileyici olduğunu kendi gözlerinizle göreceksiniz."

languages.text: "Das ist jetzt kein Versuch, mit Euch zu handeln, aber ich verspreche Euch ... wenn Ihr uns helft, werdet Ihr sehen, wie beeindruckend Glaito in Aktion ist."
languages.original_text: "Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist jetzt kein Versuch, mit Euch zu handeln, aber ich verspreche Euch ... wenn Ihr uns helft, werdet Ihr sehen, wie beeindruckend Glaito in Aktion ist."

languages.original_text: "Do not mistake this as an attempt at bargaining, but I promise you — if you agree to help us, you will see how truly impressive Glaito is in action."
